text: Esther Van Ginderen-Verbeeck, also known as Aunt Terry (8 September 1931 â€“ 30 January 2018) was a Flemish television presenter and businesswoman. She was born in Hoboken, Antwerp. From 1989, when she founded VTM she worked for this channel, again for children's programs. Van Ginderen died of pneumonia on 30 January 2018 in Bonheiden, Antwerp at the age of 86.VRT-icoon Tante Terry overleden ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Belgian businesspeople Category:Belgian television presenters
title: Terry Van Ginderen
